pageProps.content:
Experience

Surrounded by sandy beaches & tropical gardens & set on its own isolated peninsula on the east coast, Constance Prince Maurice is the only Mauritian resort that is built on stilts.
The resort offers a range of water sports, so adventurous guests will have their pick. Prince Maurice also features a one-of-a-kind floating bar & a heated lap pool for those who wish to stay active.
Families will feel right at home since little islanders can enjoy a wide range of fun-filled activities at the Constance Kids Club, while golf pros can retreat to their two 18-hole championship golf courses.
Prince Maurice is famed for its warm, Mauritian hospitality & exceptional service.

Stay

Constance Prince Maurice offers 89 rooms of different categories, including junior suites, family suites, villas or the lavish Princely Villa.
The resort features a beautiful infinity-edge swimming pool as well as a Guerlain Spa that offers rejuvenating massages & treatments & a variety of spa facilities like a hot tub, sauna, steam bath & thermal swimming pool.
Guests will have their pick from 6 restaurants & bars, all offering a wonderful selection of cuisine & cocktails.

Activities

A long list of island activities is available at Constance Prince Maurice.
Apart from exciting water sports like snorkelling, scuba diving, windsurfing, waterskiing, kayaking & fly-fishing, guests can also enjoy land activities like tennis or golf.
Those looking to slow down on holiday, can enjoy some relaxing treatments at the spa or simply relax by the pool with a cocktail in hand.

subfolders.title: Cannonier Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: On the northwest coast of Mauritius, Cannonier Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa boasts an ideal ocean-front setting where gorgeous sunsets & palm trees complete this island paradise. Cannonier is in its own category of paradise.  The resort is perched on a peninsula with 2 separate beaches, each offering a different view & atmosphere.   Surrounded by lush vegetation & built with sheer relaxation in mind, Cannonier boasts a unique safari-inspired Kids Club where young islanders between ages 3 & 11 years old can enjoy a range of exciting island activities in a generous playground & a tented village.  When kids have fun, parents relax.

subfolders.title: Constance Belle Mare Plage
subfolders.description: On the east coast of Mauritius, Constance Belle Mare Plage is set in tropical gardens overlooking a long, sandy beach. Enclose by a coral reef, the beach is ideal for swimming & snorkelling, so everyone - from children to older guests - enjoy the safe, warm water of the Indian Ocean. The resort offers a range of complimentary water sports, so adventurous guests will have their pick.  Belle Mare Plage is also the perfect fit for families since the Kakoo Kids Club will keep little islanders entertained by offering a range of fun activities.

subfolders.title: Constance Prince Maurice
subfolders.description: Surrounded by sandy beaches & tropical gardens & set on its own isolated peninsula on the east coast, Constance Prince Maurice is the only Mauritian resort that is built on stilts. The resort offers a range of water sports, so adventurous guests will have their pick.  Prince Maurice also features a one-of-a-kind floating bar & a heated lap pool for those who wish to stay active. Families will feel right at home since little islanders can enjoy a wide range of fun-filled activities at the Constance Kids Club, while golf pros can retreat to their two 18-hole championship golf courses.

subfolders.title: Dinarobin Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Dinarobin Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa has one of the most stunning locations in Mauritius.   Situated at the foot of Le Morne mountain on the southwest coast of the island, Dinarobin’s guests will be enveloped in nature. Desired by discerning guests, exquisite ocean views can be enjoyed from private verandahs, giving each suite the feeling of a private seaside home.

subfolders.title: LUX Belle Mare
subfolders.description: Overlooking a turquoise lagoon on Belle Mare beach on Mauritius’ east coast, lies the family-friendly LUX Belle Mare. The lagoon is a drawing card for water sport enthusiasts & avid swimmers, while the long stretch of white, sandy beach in front of the resort is dotted with thatched umbrellas. Unique to LUX Belle Mare, the Tea House offers nearly 90 different blends to sample & the LUX Beer Academy affords tastings of Mari Kontan rum & beer.

subfolders.title: LUX Le Morne
subfolders.description: LUX Le Morne is a luxury resort set in a beautiful, protected bay along the Le Morne peninsula lagoon on the southwest coast of Mauritius. Surrounded by lush, tropical gardens & spectacular views of the ocean, Le Morne is the ideal retreat for an idyllic island getaway. A popular phrase in Mauritius is ‘West is best’ - & it is here, on the south-west coast, where one can witness the best sunsets on the island, be that from the unique ‘floating lounge’ boat where a private butler will take care of your every need, or from the soft, sandy beach.

subfolders.title: Mauricia Beachcomber Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Mauricia Beachcomber Resort & Spa is known for its excellent location.  Situated in the heart of Grand Baie on Mauritius’ northwest coast, the resort boasts a unique, tropical island setting.   The smart-casual character of Mauricia Beachcomber blends high-quality accommodation with superb service.   Vibrant guests are attracted to this exciting island resort where dreamy beach views, exciting activities & modern touches add to the lively island atmosphere.

subfolders.title: One & Only Le Saint Geran
subfolders.description: The One & Only Le Saint Geran offers elite island luxury on the east coast of Mauritius, with exclusive access to an endless ocean, blue lagoon & white, sandy beaches. This resort is deserving of its status as a “Leading Hotel of the World.”  Here, attention to detail is paramount - a personal butler will see to your daily requirements & ensure you are relaxed throughout your stay. Guests are surrounded by crystal-clear water that is ideal for diving & snorkelling & its numerous reserves such as the nearby world-renowned Botanical Palmplemousses Garden.

subfolders.title: Paradis Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Paradis Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa is one of the most prestigious hotels in Mauritius.   Located on a stunning peninsula, on the southwest coast of the island, Paradis is renowned for its ideal setting, pristine beach & exceptional range of facilities & activities.  Its shoreline stretches for 7km around the iconic Le Morne Peninsula & is – without a doubt – one of the most beautiful locations in Mauritius.

subfolders.title: Paradise Cove Boutique Hotel
subfolders.description: As one of Mauritius best honeymoon resorts, the adults-only Paradise Cove Boutique Hotel is situated on the north coast at Anse la Raie & is the perfect island retreat for honeymooners or couples. Everything about this resort is luxurious & romantic.  From the pristine shores of the lagoon, the beautiful infinity pool & relaxing wellness spa to the glorious Indian Ocean sunsets relished from the beach or boat. The shopping hot spot of Grande Baie is located 10 minutes away by car & the local fisherman’s village of Cap Malheureux is only 2,5 km away.

subfolders.title: Royal Palm Beachcomber
subfolders.description: The Royal Palm, as the name suggests is undeniably one of the finest resorts in the Indian Ocean.   Located on the protected northwest coast of Mauritius, this exclusive resort offers luxurious sea-facing suites, service of the highest standard & superb cuisine. The resort has hosted royals, political leaders, movie stars & sports stars who have enjoyed the privacy of its quiet beach & above all – the privilege of anonymity.

subfolders.title: Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Shandrani Beachcomber has a unique location on the southeast coast of Mauritius on its own peninsula, lapped by the Blue Bay Marine Park & its rich sea life. Hugged by three beaches, Shandrani is the first choice for action-filled holidays & nature lovers. This luxurious all-inclusive resort also includes a Sailing Club & Dive Centre for water sport enthusiasts.   The resort with its unrivalled list of activities exudes a lively vibe & is an ideal choice for families as well as couples & honeymooners looking for a luxurious, yet action-packed holiday.

subfolders.title: Shanti Maurice Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Shanti Maurice Resort & Spa boasts a secluded setting on 36-acres of exclusive land on the south coast of Mauritius. Situated on one of the best beaches in Mauritius, Shanti Maurice is passionate about keeping the area peaceful & tranquil.  No motorized watersports are allowed on this pristine beach, so guests can anticipate a rejuvenating & relaxing island experience. The resort is known for its superb award-winning spa – one of Africa’s largest tropical island spas - including nutritional advice, personal training, Pilates, as well as a full range of massage & specialized treatments.

subfolders.title: The Oberoi Mauritius
subfolders.description: The Oberoi Mauritius is an elegant beach-front resort located in Turtle Bay on the northwest coast of the island. This elegant resort offers a refined experience with discreet service & its well-designed open-air public areas offer jaw-dropping views of the Indian Ocean. Set in 20-acres of gorgeous, sub-tropical gardens with views over a long stretch of white, sand beach & crystal-clear water, The Oberoi offers only the best in barefoot luxury.

subfolders.title: The St Regis Mauritius Resort
subfolders.description: The St Regis Mauritius boasts an ideal beachfront setting on the southwest coast on the turquoise shores of Le Morne Beach, one of Mauritius’ most beautiful coastlines & a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Offering the perfect blend between relaxed island life & 5-star luxury, The St Regis is an ideal choice for honeymooners, couples or romantics looking for only the best in barefoot luxury. The resort offers a variety of romantic activities, as well as tailor-made spa pamper sessions & couple’s massages.

subfolders.title: Trou aux Biches Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Located on one of the finest resort sites on the island, Trou aux Biches unfolds its magnificent suites & villas along 2km of beach on the northwest coast of Mauritius. Trou aux Biches Beachcomber has undergone a R1 billion re-vamp, unmatched anywhere in Mauritius, ensuring that they are always at the forefront of the luxury resort industry. Known for its year-round fabulous weather, the location of Trou aux Biches makes it a highly coveted Mauritian island destination.

subfolders.title: Victoria Beachcomber Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Breathtakingly beautiful, Victoria Beachcomber Resort & Spa enjoys a quiet location on the northwest coast of Mauritius.   Diving & snorkelling are exceptional at Victoria Beachcomber.  The resort’s award-winning diving academy is found on the beach itself, only 5 meters from the water’s edge & is very close to some of Mauritius’ most magnificent dives sites. The resort is quickly becoming the number one resort for every kind of guest – be it families, honeymooners or couples.

whatWeLoveItems: A range of exhilarating water sports
Floating bar, spa, heated lap pool & Kids Club
